ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of VÉRONIQUE LAMONTAGNE of Montréal, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective February 4, 2008.
